# Hippogriff — hippogriff.io

## About
Hippogriff is the personal workshop of Vicki Zhang — a home for games, agents, and experiments at the intersection of design and engineering.

## Projects
- TypeCraft: A Space Invaders typing game that makes you faster. https://typecraft.hippogriff.io

## Blog
Posts on design, engineering, and building things. Topics include game development, creative tools, and maker culture.

## Contact
GitHub: https://github.com/hippogriff-io
